## useSessionStorage() function

Use session storage value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useSessionStorage<T>(key: string, options?: UseSessionStorageOptions<T>): UseSessionStorageResult<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | Key of session storage item. |
|  options | [UseSessionStorageOptions](./hooks.usesessionstorageoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Options to interact with session storage. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[UseSessionStorageResult](./hooks.usesessionstorageresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

Value of session storage item, and a function to update it.
